summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 5 priority open recommendations for USAID as of April 2019. For example, in March 2014 we recommended that USAID collect...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: U.S. Agency for International Development
